title: Is Web3 For Me?
description: Discover which Web3 features could benefit your work and lifestyle

questions.question: What frustrates you most about current systems?

options.text: Lack of control over my data
Current systems work fine for me

questions.question: Which Web3 concept interests you most?

creator.title: Web3 Creator
creator.description: Web3 offers powerful tools for creators like you!
creator.advice: Explore NFT marketplaces, creator DAOs, and direct fan monetization. You could benefit from royalty systems and cutting out traditional middlemen.

finance.title: DeFi Explorer
finance.description: Decentralized finance could revolutionize your financial activities.
finance.advice: Start with yield farming, liquidity pools, and decentralized exchanges. Learn about lending protocols and automated market makers.

business.title: Web3 Entrepreneur
business.description: Web3 opens new business models and global opportunities.
business.advice: Investigate DAOs, tokenomics, and blockchain-based business models. Consider how smart contracts could automate your processes.

tech.title: Web3 Builder
tech.description: Your technical skills are perfect for the Web3 ecosystem.
tech.advice: Dive into smart contract development, dApp creation, and blockchain protocols. The demand for Web3 developers is huge!

privacy.title: Digital Sovereignty Seeker
privacy.description: Web3 aligns with your desire for data control and privacy.
privacy.advice: Focus on self-sovereign identity, decentralized storage, and privacy-focused protocols. You will love having control over your digital footprint.

general.title: Web3 Curious
general.description: Web3 might not be immediately relevant, but it is worth understanding.
general.advice: Start with basic education about blockchain and cryptocurrency. Keep an eye on developments that might affect your industry in the future.
